scripts.build: npm run format && npm run assets && npm run pio
scripts.format: npm run format:cpp && npm run format:web
scripts.format:web: prettier --write 'src/**/*.{js,json,css,html}' platformio.ini package.json readme.md vite.config.mjs tailwind.config.js
scripts.format:cpp: command -v clang-format >/dev/null 2>&1 && find src -iname '*.h' -o -iname '*.cpp' | xargs clang-format -i || echo 'clang-format not found, skipping format:cpp'
scripts.pio: npm run pio:firmware && sleep 2 && npm run pio:filesystem
